name: EventEntityHealed
description: This event is fired when any entity in the world is healed.
overview: Fires when any entity (not just the player) receives healing. Includes mobs, animals, players, etc. The `health` field represents current health after the healing. The `amount` field is the amount of health restored. Not cancellable.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
